attributes.action: reduce the gestastional age from 24 weeks to 11 weeks for an abortion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As everyone has seen on the news recently a baby born at 22 weeks has survived and yet over here we can still have abortions up until 24 weeks. A baby is fully formed by 12 weeks so we feel the limit should be droppped from 24 to 11 weeks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
